OOC: Dah, oops! That last line was supposed to say "we had no idea you Maxi=
mals were allied with the Chivtrons"...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
From: Soulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 1=
5, 2001 1:15 AM
  Subject: Re: The D.E.D are back./Shockwave talk...


  Ra=
distor knew this was coming, and actually jumped over Hot Rod and landed to=
 the other side of him. Then he spun around and looked down at Hot Rod agai=
n.

  Radistor: We were just helping out our friends in the Alliance, whom =
Radistor has aboard himself right now. We were attacking the Chivtrons beca=
use they have within their group a certain ex Maximal named Arrow. He betra=
yed the Maximals, and us Radicons saw it fit to destroy him. We had no idea=
 you Chivtrons were allied with the Maximals...

  ----- Original Message -=
---- 
    From: Legendarynemasis@... 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
 =
   Sent: Sunday, July 15, 2001 12:25 AM
    Subject: Re: The D.E.D are back=
./Shockwave talk...


    Gemini Dragon laughed as Radistor was set ablaze.=
 Quickly he swept 
    down towards him and unleashed two highly explosive =
fireballs at him 
    as well as two beams of liquid nitrogen.
